row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 1)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 3)
row_desc: Queen has at least four mini challenge wins.
Queen has two mini challenge wins.
Queen has one mini challenge win.
col_desc: Queen has three lip sync wins.
Queen has at least three lip sync wins.
